title: Marauder Skins!
body: After having seen the Marauder Ashe/WW skins, I'd like to hear some other concepts for champs within this skin class (Marauder).

replies.body:
Marauder Garen or Marauder Aatrox
http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/berserk/images/8/8c/Berserker_Armour_Version_2.png/revision/latest?cb=20120517182924
http://static.comicvine.com/uploads/original/13/131364/2616148-berserk-guts_par-douzen.jpg
http://th02.deviantart.net/fs70/PRE/f/2012/017/e/e/berserk_by_xialousi-d4mo0mj.jpg
I have to ask,is that Guts from Berserk?
Yes :3

Oh thanks.
I wasn't sure since I've only seen images of the fully armored Guts.Not caught up yet & don't want to because of its release schedule.
aaaaaaaaaaaaahhyeeaaaaaaaaaaaa
Oh yeah! Give him that "helmet synth" voice, a long, black and red cape (maybe one of those off one shoulder capes?) and make the sword crystalline black!
I would love to see a Marauder Tryndamere skin. It would fit him so well.

> [{quoted}](name=Bones96,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=FQwj2Mql,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-28T00:33:09.957+0000)
>
> I would love to see a Marauder Tryndamere skin. It would fit him so well.

Oooh, that could be really cool!
Oh crap, it's Riot! First ever Riot reply to one of my comments. Does this mean you're gonna make it happen? Even if you're not on the skin team. (I don't know if you are) ;)

> [{quoted}](name=Bones96,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=FQwj2Mql,comment-id=000000010003,timestamp=2015-01-29T07:11:51.817+0000)
>
> Oh crap, it's Riot! First ever Riot reply to one of my comments. Does this mean you're gonna make it happen? Even if you're not on the skin team. (I don't know if you are) ;)

I'm on the skins team. :3 No guarantees, but it doesn't hurt to bring up ideas!
his sword needs to look like zangetsu
What was the inspiration for the Marauder and Inquisitor skins?

OH! Good call!
He and Ashe can go Marauding together :P give him a red cape, looming, black pauldrons (or maybe just the one shoulderpad, since Rito has such a penchant for that haha), and his sword could have a cruel, onyxian edge with a jagged crimson streak along its length?

Very good call, mate.
Nice description. Sounds good. Also, didn't even realize that about him and Ashe going together.
Marauder Quinn... in fact, Quinn should've got a Maurader skin before Ashe (and mildly similar in look to the one Ashe is getting...)
As a Quinn main, I approve! :D

Marauder versions of Aatrox, Talon, Zed, Darius, Jarvan IV, Jax, Master Yi, Pantheon, Rengar, Sion, Trundle.
Yeah, I went through the list, but those are all characters I think would look AMAZING, based on the previews I've seen for Warwick and Ashe! :)
I thought I had posted the idea here, but I guess not. While working on art for one of my concepts, I came up with Marauder Teemo when turning HELMET BRO into a yordle :P "Satan needs new digs."
marauder talon be pretty cool to see since there arent many talon skins

I'm was gonna go for Marauder Morde, but it would be too similar to one of his existing skins. Current Marauders are Zaun/Frejlord, adc/jungler, so a mid lane Ionian:

Marauder Zed, because he would look freaking incredible. Just picture it: That incredibly awesome helmet, the red glow around suits of armor for his shadows, dynamic shuriken designed similarly to the pattern on Ashe's bow. Yeah, just completely cool.

MARAUDER RENGAR PLS OH PLS,

when i saw marauder warwick i thought it was a new rengar skin and i was about to be so hype, but then i got dissapointed that the skin was going to that potato skinning simulator of a champion >_>
